column1: List of objects and sources of data.
aRedshifts from Eracleous & Halpern (2004), except for NGC 1097, whose redshift was measured from the spectra of Storchi-Bergmann, Baldwin & Wilson (1993).

bReferences to sources of data: (1) New observations presented in this paper, (2) Gezari, Halpern & Eracleous (2007), (3) Lewis, Eracleous & Storchi-Bergmann (2010), (4) Storchi-Bergmann et al. (2003) , (5) Schimoia et al. (2015), (6) Gaskell (1996), (7) SDSS DR2, (8) Liu et al. (2016a), (9) Osterbrock, Koski & Phillips (1976), (10) Shapovalova et al. (2013), and (11) Popović et al. (2014).
